cards.flavor_text: [i]All consuming, life itself bends beneath it.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever a lore counter is put on a permanent you control, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature.
Permanents with counters on them have vigilance.

Spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Creatures you control with counters on them have evolve. [i](Whenever a creature you control enters, if that creature has greater power or toughness than that creature, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.)[/i]

Creatures you control get +1/+1 for each creature card in your graveyard.
Sacrifice a creature: Surveil 1. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]

Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater becomes blocked, create a treasure token.
{2}: Target creature you control must be blocked this turn if able.
At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. You may reveal that card. If you do, add {W}{B} and put it into your graveyard. If you don't reveal it, put it into your hand.

Enchant commander you control
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create X 1/1 white Wolf tokens, where X is that spells mana value.
Attacking modified creatures you control get +1/+0 and have first strike. [i](Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)[/i]

Whenever you cast a spell that targets a permanent you control, you may pay {C}{U}. If you do, Create an Absolvement. [i](It's an enchantment Aura with “Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 for each enchantment you control.”)[/i] Attach it to target creature you control.
Modified creatures you control have changeling. [i](Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications. This card is every creature type.)[/i]

Enchant commander you control
Modified creatures you control have prowess. [i](Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)[/i]

If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, you may create that many clue tokens instead.
{T}: Investigate. [i](Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]

Whenever a -1/-1 counter is put on a creature, you may put a land from your hand onto the battlefield tapped. Do this only once each turn.
Modified creatures have wither. [i](Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications. This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)[/i]

If you would surveil, you may instead exile an instant card from your graveyard. When do you, copy that card. You may cast the copy this turn.
Whenever you cast a sorcery spell, you may surveil 1. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]

Enchant commander you control
Other creatures you control are Dragons in addition to their other types. The same is true for creature spells you control and creature cards you own that aren't on the battlefield.

Enchant player.
If a nonland permanent card would be put into enchanted player's graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.
At the beginning of enchanted player's end step, put all cards exiled with Curse of Betrayal onto the battlefield under your control.

Spells you cast have bargain. [i](You may sacrifice an artifact, enchantment, or token as you cast this spell.)[/i]
Whenever you a spell, if it was bargained, Add: {B}.

Whenever a creature you control with power greater than its base power enters, you may exile a card from your hand, if you do draw two cards. Do this only once per turn.
Creature tokens you control get +1/+1 for each card you own in exile.

Enchant commander you control
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has “Whenever enchanted creature attacks, exile the top two card of your library, you may play them for as long as they are exiled.”

[+2]: Choose a creature type. Draw a card for each permanent you control of that type.
[0]: Create a 1/1 colorless Shapeshifter creature token with Changeling [i](This card is every creature type.)[/i]
[-1]: Exile target multicolored permanent.
Nidn, The Counsil can be your commander.
Choose an Aspect [i](You can have an Aspect as a second commander.)[/i] [i](You can have an Aspect as a second commander.)[/i]

cards.rules_text:
You may look at the top card of your library at any time.
You may play the top card of your library by tapping two untapped permanent in addition to paying its other costs.
Choose an Aspect [i](You can have an Aspect as a second commander.)[/i]

When Lorn, The Hunger enters the battlefield, exile the top X cards of your library, you may cast them for as long as they are exiled.
Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, create a treasure token.
Choose an Aspect [i](You can have an Aspect as a second commander.)[/i] [i](You can have an Aspect as a second commander.)[/i]

At the beginning of your upkeep, you may remove a lore counter from any number of permanents. If you do, put X +1/+1 counters on target creature, where X is the number of lore counters removed this way.
Choose an Aspect [i](You can have an Aspect as a second commander.)[/i] [i](You can have an Aspect as a second commander.)[/i]

At the beginning of your draw step, you may draw an additional card. If you do, mill four cards.
{B}: {T}, You may cast target instant card from your graveyard until end of turn. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead. [i](You still pay its costs. Timing rules still apply.)[/i]
Choose an Aspect [i](You can have an Aspect as a second commander.)[/i] [i](You can have an Aspect as a second commander.)[/i]

Whenever you cast a spell with mana value 4 or greater, create two 2/2 white Wolf creature tokens.
{T}: Add {R}.
Choose an Aspect [i](You can have an Aspect as a second commander.)[/i] [i](You can have an Aspect as a second commander.)[/i]

Whenever you put one or more counters on target permanent you control, you may cast a noncreature spell with mana value 3 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.
Choose an Aspect [i](You can have an Aspect as a second commander.)[/i]

At the beginning of your combat phase, up to three target artifacts you control become 4/4 artifact creatures.
Artifact spells you control have evoke {2}. [i](You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters.)[/i]
Choose an Aspect [i](You can have an Aspect as a second commander.)[/i] [i](You can have an Aspect as a second commander.)[/i]

When Angmar, The Bladed enters the battlefield, sacrifice any number of permanents, then create that many treasure tokens.
Whenever a player sacrifices a token, you add {B}.
Choose an Aspect [i](You can have an Aspect as a second commander.)[/i]

At the beginning of your end step, you may remove two +1/+1 counters from target permanent you control. If you do, create two 1/1 green Ooze creature tokens.
{T}: Sacrifice a creature token, put X +1/+1 counters on target creature, where X is the sacrificed token's power.
Choose an Aspect [i](You can have an Aspect as a second commander.)[/i] [i](You can have an Aspect as a second commander.)[/i]
If Balion, The Empty is your commander, choose a color before the game begins. Balion, The Empty is the chosen color.

If Seer, The Timeless is your commander, choose a color before the game begins. Seer, The Timeless is the chosen color.
Choose an Aspect [i](You can have an Aspect as a second commander.)[/i] [i](You can have an Aspect as a second commander.)[/i]

Prowess
Instant and sorcery spells you cast have rebound. [i](If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)[/i]
Choose an Aspect [i](You can have an Aspect as a second commander.)[/i] [i](You can have an Aspect as a second commander.)[/i]

This spell cost {1} less for each creature you control with power 4 or greater.
Attacking creatures you control that have power 4 or greater get +3/+3 until end of turn.
Choose an Aspect [i](You can have an Aspect as a second commander.)[/i] [i](You can have an Aspect as a second commander.)[/i]

This spell costs {2} less for each Equipment you control.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may attach any number of target Equipment you control to Reise.
Choose an Aspect [i](You can have an Aspect as a second commander.)[/i] [i](You can have an Aspect as a second commander.)[/i]

Demonstrate. [i](When you cast this spell, you may copy it. If you do, choose an opponent to also copy it.)[/i]
Scry 2, then draw a card.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The future holds what you want it to.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Create a 1/1 blue and red Otter creature token with prowess. Scry 1
Remove up to one lore counters from target permanent you control, then put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It gains trample until end of turn.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may discard a card.
Blazing Glory deals 2 damage to target creature or player. If the additional cost was paid, create a Treasure token.

Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
At the beginning of each end step, if you have cast a noncreature spell, you draw a card.

Devour 2 [i](As this enters, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters with twice that many +1/+1 counters on it.)[/i]
At the beginning of combat on your turn, create X 3/3 green Beast creature tokens, where X is the number of cards in target opponent's hand minus 3.

At the beginning of your end step, starting with you, each player votes for pack or plant. If pack gets more votes, create a 4/4 blue Beast creature token. If plant gets more votes or the vote is tied, create two 1/2 green Plant creature tokens.
